alert.note: Alert for Eastern Hanover; Eastern King William; New Kent; Western King William (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 6:59AM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern New Kent, southeastern Hanover and central King William Counties through 730 AM EDT... At 659 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Manquin, or 8 miles west of King William, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Tunstall around 715 AM EDT. King William around 720 AM EDT. Talleysville around 730 AM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Enfield, Quinton, Central Garage, Rumford, Lanesville, Browns Corner, Palls, Westwood and Rose Garden. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Hanover; Eastern King William; New Kent; Western King William
